10px;padding:0px;direction:ltr;word-wrap:break-word"><span class="m_-9216550608719686353gmail-BVRRReviewText" style="box-sizing:border-box;zoom:1;word-wrap:break-word">Lilving in a hot, humid climate I am always trying new antiperspirants/deodorants but IF they work they eventually make my underarms break out in a rash and I have to switch to another brand before long. I tried this on a whim as it is one of my two favorite perfume fragrances. I have to tell you, I purchased it one year ago, and not only does it work, it doesnt irritate my skin at all, and there is still plenty left. I have never had a deodorant last so long or work so well and not irritate my skin. I dont know what is in it, but I am one pleased woman! wonderful it actually works! Like the prior reviewer, I perspire a lot and have tried everything over the counter (including men&#39;s deodorant). I read about this deodorant over a year ago in a woman&#39;s magazine which praised it for being the best. Ladies, this is well worth the price and I&#39;ve given it to friends as stocking stuffers for those unwilling to pay the price. I&#39;ve converted all of them and they love the fact on how well this goes on and how it does not streak your black clothing.<br style="box-sizing:border-box">I highly recommend. I keep 2-3 at a time. One always is in my travel bag.
